thread.title: PRIM Technology, INC. - specialize in contract manufacturing in customized shapes and sizes
thread.title_full: PRIM Technology, INC. - specialize in contract manufacturing in customized shapes and sizes

title: PRIM Technology, INC. - specialize in contract manufacturing in customized shapes and sizes
text: PRIM Technology, INC. - specialize in contract manufacturing in customized shapes and sizes Press release briefs about the manufacturers specialize in mold-making, injection molding, stamping and assembly to provide quality products in customized shapes and sizes. USA, 24 September 2015 -- PRIM Technology, INC. is a U.S.-based sales and support organization for our sister companies located in Tianmu Lake Industrial Park in Liyang of Jiangsu, China. We have great expertise in selecting the right material for the customers keeping in mind their particular need to project. We offer custom product development for in house and sub contracting secondary operation. Our company has a good team of technicians and consultant so we’re able to manage the best turnkey projects. We helped over 100+ customers over US and Europe. We employ the best in class control process to ensure the finest accuracy and quality.We employ professional technicians for manufacturing and customization of mold parts that are widely used in development of other plastic products. If your company deals in plastic product manufacturing, we’re the best service provider to choose from. Contract manufacturing firm have their own engineers for manufacturing quality mold products. Our professionals also offer free consultation and inquiry to the clients. Technicians have the skill for creating all types of prototype and fabrication right from very simple to complex mold parts. We’re basically deal in creating the customized injection and Feed machinery for designing tailored mold objects. We work for 24*7 to enable round the clock services for the clients. There is special team of technicians for contract feed machinery. Firstly, clients need to submit the complete details about their project before we actually initiate to work on that such as project cost, deadline, type of fabrication, molding type, injection quality, type of material, customization and others. We offer cost effective and specialized services for prototyping, molding and customization of the product. Our expert technicians employ high end tools and technologies for creating the most advanced and précised product. We have an expert of team of troubleshooter who’re experienced enough to recognize the problem and how to resolve it. Therefore, we’re able to complete our project on time for Pellet mill production line. To get more info about our manufacturing services and development of customized product . Feel free to visit our website http://www.primtechnology.com and contact us. PRIM Technology, INC. South San Francisco, CA 94080 Tel:- 408-705-2943
